channel.title: Bluebeard's Bride - Book of Mirrors
channel.description:
Bluebeard's Bride was definitely one of my favorite games of 2018. The few times I got a chance to run and play it, I had such a wonderful time. I love the construction of the game and the very specific story it's telling, but how it handles so differently in the hands of different MCs.
I'm still really excited about the [Book of Mirrors supplement](https://www.magpiegames.com/2019/01/24/masks-unbound-now-available-as-pdf-and-pre-order/) for Bluebeard's Bride. I've been pestering my F2F group about playing either the Bluebeard's Legacy setting or the Condemned Asylum setting.
Has anyone had a chance to play any of the new settings yet?
